options.content:
# OSP Dependency pipeline

TripleO-CI takes the lastest good build of OSP and deploys with specific OSP rpm dependencies of unknown quality.  e.g. take the very latest builds of ansible and inject them into a known working build.

Pending releases for Example:

- RHEL
- Container Tools
- Ansible releases
- Ceph re
- Openvswitch
- Pacemaker
